name: waxes, refined, derived from petroleum based or synthetic hydrocarbon feedstocks, high viscosity
Restrictions: Average molecular weight not less than 500 Da.Viscosity at 100 °C not less than 11 cSt (11 × 10-6 m2/s).Content of mineral hydrocarbons with Carbon number less than 25, not more than 5 % (w/w)
